about_the_game:
This DLC is intended for players who enjoy the game and want to continue to show their support for the developer and get some cool extras in the game! The Revenue split from this DLC is the same as the main game. 30% goes to charities untill we hit break even, with 70% going to charities after this point

This Skin Pack features two skins for the Drone and Operator:
  • Georgian Legion Drone and Operator Skin
  • NAFO Fella Drone and Operator Skin

You can choose the skins from the Drone and Pilot Customization screen before you start a run of the game.

Become a supporter of Death From Above and Ukraine, by gearing up with skins featuring two of the greatest supporters of Ukraine's fight for freedom!
The Georgian Legion is a unit of the Ukrainian Army that was formed in 2014 by Georgian volunteers who wanted to fight against Russian aggression in the Donbas region. They have participated in several battles and skirmishes, such as the Battle of Kyiv, the Battle of Mariupol, and the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine. They are commanded by Mamuka Mamulashvili, a veteran Georgian officer.

NAFO is an acronym for the North Atlantic Fella Organization, which is an internet meme and social media movement that supports Ukraine and counters Russian propaganda and disinformation about the 2022 Russian invasion of Ukraine. NAFO is not an official or formal organization, but rather a decentralized network of volunteers who share a common goal and a sense of humor. They have raised enormous amounts of money and mainstream attention and support for the Ukrainian defense and reconstruction efforts, so we're honoring them by including them in Death From Above. Dress for success!

name: Death From Above: Fellas & Defenders Supporter Skin Pack

package_groups.name: default
package_groups.title: Buy Death From Above: Fellas & Defenders Supporter Skin Pack

short_description: Join the fight for Ukraine’s sovereignty and democracy and support DfA with this pack of exclusive skins inspired by the Georgian Legion and NAFO. Wear the colors of the brave volunteers and meme warriors who stand against Russian aggression!
supported_languages: English, Ukrainian, French, German, Japanese, Polish, Belarusian, Georgian, Turkish, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Finnish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal
